_comment: Validation Report Template for RDMAP Pass 3 (v2.5)
_comment_usage: This template defines the structure for validation reports generated during Pass 3. All fields should be populated based on validation checks performed on extraction.json

cross_reference_integrity._comment: Issues with cross-references between entities (broken references, bidirectional inconsistencies, orphaned objects)

hierarchy_validation._comment: Issues with tier hierarchies (RD→M→P, Core→Intermediate→Supporting claims, evidence chains)

schema_compliance._comment: Schema v2.5 compliance issues (missing required fields, invalid enum values, ID format errors, location structure issues)

source_verification._comment: Source verification for all items (explicit items must have verbatim_quote, implicit items must have trigger infrastructure)

source_verification_metrics._comment: Pass rates for sourcing quality by entity type

expected_information_completeness._comment: Tracking of expected but missing information (critical for transparency assessment)

consolidation_verification._comment: Issues with consolidation metadata or inappropriate consolidations

type_consistency._comment: Type/structure consistency issues (design types, method types, status/sourcing mismatches)

recommendations: _comment: Array of actionable recommendations for fixing issues, prioritized by severity
